StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_SetJPASSubmiterInfo]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@UserLogin AS varchar(15), @SubmiterName AS varchar(64), @SubmiterTitle AS varchar(32), @SubmiterPhone AS varchar(16)
AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM JPAS_SUBMITTER_INFO WHERE USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin) BEGIN UPDATE JPAS_SUBMITTER_INFO SET SUBMITTER_NAME = @SubmiterName, SUBMITTER_TITLE = @SubmiterTitle, SUBMITTER_PHONE = @SubmiterPhone WHERE USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin END
ELSE INSERT INTO JPAS_SUBMITTER_INFO (USER_LOGIN, SUBMITTER_NAME, SUBMITTER_TITLE, SUBMITTER_PHONE) VALUES (@UserLogin, @SubmiterName, @SubmiterTitle, @SubmiterPhone)
